conclusion: Liquid will flow out from A, B, C, and D.
There are baffles in the path of the liquid.
Container E is on the left side.
Container F is on the right side.
Liquid from A will flow towards container E after passing through baffles.
Liquid from B will flow towards container F after passing through baffles.
Liquid from C will flow towards container E after passing through baffles.
Liquid from D will flow towards container F after passing through baffles.
